A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is obviously a polarizing movie. Polarizing\, flawed\, but (personally) completely enjoyable.

The key to enjoying it is to realize that the characters from the original trilogy are firmly supporting cast. This is not their story anymore\, they're still important\, but the focus is where it needs to be- with Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, and Kylo. It's no longer just the stories of the handful of people from the original trilogy or prequel trilogy\, and the movie makes this point through the reveal of Reys parentage.

It fleshes out the aforemented characters\, giving them personality that was sorely missing from VII.
